entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
